message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer. I can sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $90. I'm willing to go up to $95. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can offer you a deal for $105. It's the highest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $95. I'm willing to go up to $98. Can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to go above $105, Bob. However, I can offer you a slight discount to $102. It's the best I can do.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $95. I'm willing to go up to $97. Can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to go above $102, Bob. However, I can offer you a slight discount to $101. It's the best I can do.
I'm willing to go up to $96. That's the highest I'm willing to pay. Can you meet me there?
